# Test Fixtures

This directory contains sample PDFs for testing the library.

## Required Sample PDFs

Please add the following types of PDFs to `sample-pdfs/`:

1. **text-based.pdf** - Simple text-based PDF with standard fonts
2. **scanned.pdf** - Scanned image PDF requiring OCR
3. **complex-layout.pdf** - Multi-column layout with tables
4. **forms.pdf** - PDF with interactive form fields
5. **vector-graphics.pdf** - PDF with vector graphics and illustrations
6. **mixed-content.pdf** - PDF with text, images, and graphics
7. **large.pdf** - Large PDF for performance testing (>100 pages)
8. **multilingual.pdf** - PDF with multiple languages/scripts

## Note

These files are not included in the repository due to size and licensing considerations.
Add your own test PDFs to this directory for local testing.
